verses.verse: It happened after <S%H310><s%> many <S%H7227><s%> days, <S%H3117><s%> when Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> had given rest <S%H5117><s%> to Israel <S%H3478><s%> from their enemies <S%H341><s%> all around, <S%H5439><s%> and Joshua <S%H3091><s%> was old <S%H2204><s%> and well advanced <S%H935><s%> in years, <S%H3117><s%>

that Joshua <S%H3091><s%> called <S%H7121><s%> for all Israel, <S%H3478><s%> for their elders <S%H2205><s%> and for their heads, <S%H7218><s%> and for their judges <S%H8199><s%> and for their officers, <S%H7860><s%> and said <S%H559><s%> to them, <S%H2204><s%> "I am old and well advanced <S%H935><s%> in years. <S%H3117><s%>

You have seen <S%H7200><s%> all that Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> has done <S%H6213><s%> to all these nations <S%H1471><s%> because <S%H6440><s%> of you; <S%H3068><s%> for it is Yahweh your God <S%H430><s%> who has fought for you. <S%H3898><s%>

Behold, <S%H7200><s%> I have allotted <S%H5307><s%> to you these nations <S%H1471><s%> that remain, <S%H7604><s%> to be an inheritance <S%H5159><s%> for your tribes, <S%H7626><s%> from the Jordan, <S%H3383><s%> with all the nations <S%H1471><s%> that I have cut off, <S%H3772><s%> even to the great <S%H1419><s%> sea <S%H3220><s%> toward the going down of the sun. <S%H3996><s%>

Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> will thrust <S%H1920><s%> them out from before <S%H6440><s%> you, <S%H3423><s%> and drive them from out of your sight. <S%H6440><s%> You shall possess <S%H3423><s%> their land, <S%H776><s%> as Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> spoke to you. <S%H1696><s%>

"Therefore be very <S%H3966><s%> courageous <S%H2388><s%> to keep <S%H8104><s%> and to do <S%H6213><s%> all that is written <S%H3789><s%> in the book <S%H5612><s%> of the law <S%H8451><s%> of Moses, <S%H4872><s%> that you not turn <S%H5493><s%> aside from it to the right hand <S%H3225><s%> or to the left; <S%H8040><s%>

that you not come <S%H935><s%> among these nations, <S%H1471><s%> these that remain <S%H7604><s%> among you; <S%H2142><s%> neither make mention of the name <S%H8034><s%> of their gods, <S%H430><s%> nor cause to swear <S%H7650><s%> by them, <S%H5647><s%> neither serve them, <S%H7812><s%> nor bow down yourselves to them;
but hold <S%H1692><s%> fast to Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> your God, <S%H430><s%> as you have done <S%H6213><s%> to this day. <S%H3117><s%>

"For Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> has driven great <S%H1419><s%> and strong <S%H6099><s%> nations <S%H1471><s%> out <S%H3423><s%> from before <S%H6440><s%> you. <S%H376><s%> But as for you, no man has stood <S%H5975><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> you to this day. <S%H3117><s%>

One <S%H259><s%> man <S%H376><s%> of you shall chase <S%H7291><s%> a thousand; <S%H505><s%> for it is Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> who fights <S%H3898><s%> for you, <S%H1696><s%> as he spoke to you.
Take good <S%H3966><s%> heed <S%H8104><s%> therefore to yourselves, <S%H5315><s%> that you love <S%H157><s%> Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> your God. <S%H430><s%>

"But if you do at all <S%H7725><s%> go back, <S%H7725><s%> and hold <S%H1692><s%> fast to the remnant <S%H3499><s%> of these nations, <S%H1471><s%> even these who remain <S%H7604><s%> among you, <S%H2859><s%> and make marriages with them, <S%H935><s%> and go in to them, and they to you;

know <S%H3045><s%> for a certainty <S%H3045><s%> that Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> will no longer <S%H3254><s%> drive these nations <S%H1471><s%> from out <S%H3423><s%> of your sight; <S%H6440><s%> but they shall be a snare <S%H6341><s%> and a trap <S%H4170><s%> to you, <S%H7850><s%> a scourge in your sides, <S%H6654><s%> and thorns <S%H6796><s%> in your eyes, <S%H5869><s%> until you perish <S%H6><s%> from off this good <S%H2896><s%> land <S%H127><s%> which Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> has given you. <S%H5414><s%>

"Behold, <S%H3117><s%> today I am going <S%H1980><s%> the way <S%H1870><s%> of all the earth. <S%H776><s%> You know <S%H3045><s%> in all your hearts <S%H3824><s%> and in all your souls <S%H5315><s%> that not one <S%H259><s%> thing <S%H1697><s%> has failed <S%H5307><s%> of all the good <S%H2896><s%> things <S%H1697><s%> which Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> spoke <S%H1696><s%> concerning you. <S%H935><s%> All have happened to you. <S%H259><s%> Not one thing <S%H1697><s%> has failed of it. <S%H5307><s%>

It shall happen that as all the good <S%H2896><s%> things <S%H1697><s%> have come <S%H935><s%> on you of which Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> spoke <S%H1696><s%> to you, <S%H3068><s%> so Yahweh will bring <S%H935><s%> on you all the evil <S%H7451><s%> things, <S%H1697><s%> until he has destroyed <S%H8045><s%> you from off this good <S%H2896><s%> land <S%H127><s%> which Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> has given you, <S%H5414><s%>

when you disobey <S%H5674><s%> the covenant <S%H1285><s%> of Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> your God, <S%H430><s%> which he commanded <S%H6680><s%> you, <S%H1980><s%> and go and serve <S%H5647><s%> other <S%H312><s%> gods, <S%H430><s%> and bow <S%H7812><s%> down yourselves to them. <S%H639><s%> Then the anger of Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> will be kindled <S%H2734><s%> against you, <S%H6><s%> and you will perish quickly <S%H4120><s%> from off the good <S%H2896><s%> land <S%H776><s%> which he has given to you. <S%H5414><s%>"
